name: Orbital Oranges
description:
----- Orbital Oranges ----- Made for LDJam52 ----- Story -----

The cargo ship of the interstellar logistics company Orbital Oranges got completely destroyed in an asteroid field when it tried to reach a secluded human outpost in the yet to be explored reaches of outer space.

You are a supply robot from this outpost and your task is to secure the vital crops from the wreckage.

But beware!

The energy core of the cargo ship is slowly overheating and threatens to explode.

Can you harvest enough fruits to ensure the survival of your humans until your time runs out?

----- GAMEPLAY -----

Use your spaceship to transport stray cargo.

Equip new ship parts to customize your vessel.

Secure crops by shooting them through the tractor gate.

----- DISCLAIMER -----

Unfortunately there were complications which slowed us down. So we couldn't finish this project.

There is currently no objective in this build.

To interact use the Left-Mousebutton (Sorry settings are outdated °_°)

-> Just enjoy the view in your brand new spaceship.

----- GAMEPAD IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED -----
